thread.title: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. strains hamstring
thread.title_full: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. strains hamstring - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. strains hamstring
text:
1 of 2 | License Photo EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. -- New York Giants wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr., who had 121 yards on seven receptions Sunday, suffered a strained hamstring at the end of the third quarter against the San Francisco 49ers .
Beckham , who caught a 17-yard touchdown pass to break a 13-13 tie, has had hamstring issues in the past. He missed his first four games of his rookie season with a chronic hamstring issue that also cost him his rookie training camp.
Beckham, who shooed away Giants medical personnel once he went to the sideline, is questionable to return.
